featured.text: For one thing, only the husk of the cactus is used for generating biofuel, while its inner flesh is still preserved for food.
Over the years, only the edible soft inner flesh has been used.

definition.zh_def: 肉體，特別是指動物或人的肌肉和皮膚。
definition.en_def: The soft substance of the body of a human or an animal, consisting of muscle and fat.
definition.example: The chef prepared a delicious dish using fresh fish flesh.
